armed forces loyal to incumbent Laurent Gbagbo to stop and search U.N. peacekeeping vehicles in the West African country. Ivorian army spokesman Colonel Babri Gohourou said earlier on state television that the country's armed forces were under instruction to stop and search vehicles marked with a` UN' in circulation. The United Nations has called on Gbagbo to resign the presidency of the cocoa-producing country, saying he lost a November 28 election to challenger Alassane Ouattara . Tools division. Amitabh Srivastava , senior vice president over the company's Azure cloud unit, will be leaving, CEO Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to employees Wednesday. Groundwork OpenSource offers open source IT management software Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
